comments:
VM: sun jdk 1.4.2_01
Command line arguments: -vmargs -mx256M

Steps to reproduce:
- Unzip a fresh 3.0M9 in an empty directory
- Launch eclipse
- Create a new java project with default settings
- Create a new class with the class wizard. (com.test.Test)
- Add a public constructor and a public method with javadoc and normal comments
for both
- Add two import lines (I added java.applet.* and java.awt.*)
- Close the editor
- Go to the folding preferences (Windows->Preferences->Java->Editor->Folding)
- Check all boxes on the tab. (there should be five of them).
- Open the Test class.

Result:
The import statements are collapsed, nothing else is.

Expected result:
Import statements, methods and comments should be collapsed.

Build id: 200405211200
